announcement.title_zh: 关于PokerFi星球正式启动能量费永久回购销毁PK币的公告
announcement.title_en: Announcement on PokerFi Planet officially launching permanent energy fee repurchase and burning PK tokens
list_zh: 在PokerFi星球的整个经济运作体系中，30%的能量费收入将专项用于回购并销毁PK币，我们将于今日正式启动该项合约的执行，30%比例的能量费收入将持续永久的进行PK币回购并定期进行销毁公示。该项合约执行地址：
欢迎所有玩家持续监控该地址资产流向。
list_en: In the entire economic operation system of PokerFi Planet, 30% of the energy fee income will be used to buy back and destroy PK tokens. We will officially start the execution of this contract today. 30% of the energy fee income will buy back PK tokens forever.  Token burning announcements in detail will be made regularly.  The contract execution address:
All players are welcome to continuously monitor the asset flow of this address.
